import React from "react"; /** * Title: Choices for Playing the Game */ export let HelpText =

Test: Play against yourself. Test the game or pieces that you created to see if you like it. Demonstrate a sequence of moves to someone. Check that a particular feature still works after it is updated/added.

Black: Play against the computer as black

White: Play against computer as white

Note: at date of writing the computer is still extremely easy to beat for anyone with moderate Chess experience. Remove this notice when AI is implemented further.
